title: Alant részletezve ...
content:
Kérlek, segítsetek!

Csütörtökön win10 frissítés, közvetlen utána ESET internet Security is frissült volna, de ez sikertelen lett, a végén azért adott egy kb 10 pontos javaslatot, hogy miket tegyek. Az első néhány az ESET licencére vonatkozott (eseteg lejárt, NEM), az utolsó valószínűsítette, hogy a gép fertőzött. Sicontact-nál nem találtak a gépen gyanúsat. Plusz, lecserélték a Firefox-ot.

Így eltűnt a videodownloadhelper kiegészítő. Nem tudom feltenni "Video DownloadHelper szerző: mig Kiadási megjegyzések ehhez: 7.6.0 Ajánlott A telepítés megszakadt, mert a kiegészítő sérültnek tűnik."

Próbáltam belépni a korábbi támogatási fiókomba (volt név és jelszó), de most nem volt elég a név, e-mail címet kért. Próbáltam e-mail címmel, erre azt üzente, hogy az nem nyújt e-mail szolgáltatást, holott közvetle előtte megnéztem, hogy működik-e? "Elírta az e-mail címet? A(z) freestart.hu nem nyújt e-mail szolgáltatást." email.png freestart.hu.png

Másik domain-nel próbálkoztam, itt is csak a 2-al sikerült, miután átiratták/bővíttették a bejelentkezési adataimat.

Mit tegyek? Üdv

title: Version 102.1
content: Upon update to V102.1, I was surprised to see that, once again, Firefox has seen fit to reset all my "Privacy" settings to be more amenable to their partners. Since this is not the first time, I assume that FF periodically decides to reset your settings without any confirmation from you. However, I also found that the browser no longer connected to anything on the Internet, and that all my Add Ons had been deleted as well. FF is now unuseable (I am submitting this from my new browser, since FF no longer works). I can only wonder what else their QA team might have missed...

How can I put it back to the top one. - only way I have been to fix this is to exchange it with my own (made) icon - and with this FK (Familykin) one, I can not find a logo clipart to replace it. title: Captive Poertal Detection
content:
Recently I will have a bar at the top of my browser pop up, about every 2-3 minutes, stating that, "You must login to this network before you can access the internet". Of course, I am already connected to the internet and web surfing like normal. It's extremely annoying, momentarily resizes the window which I am browsing on and has no way (at least that I am aware of) to stop it.

Whatever this new feature is I would like it to stop. I did some reading, the article indicating disabling this feature can cause security issues, however there has to be someway that this doesn't constantly popup and annoy me to death. Looking for any explanation/information on how to prevent the constant annoyance of this bar popping up.

title: Pressing "Ctrl" opens the sidebar for some reason? How do I stop it?
content:
Within the last day or two, Firefox has started opening the sidebar whenever I press "ctrl", which has caused a lot of annoying misclicks and prevents me from using "ctrl+" functions (e.g. new tab, cut, copy, paste, etc.).

How do I disable the sidebar? The instructions at the support page titled "Use the Firefox Sidebar to access bookmarks, history and synced tabs", specifically the subsection titled "Toggle the Sidebar on and off" (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/use-firefox-sidebar-access-bookmarks-history-synced), are unhelpful at best and incomprehensible at worst.

This problem is incredibly frustrating, and has even impeded me writing this request for help, since I couldn't use the keyboard to copy+paste the article title and URL.

TL;DR Please help me (permanently?) disable the sidebar from appearing.
creator: tankertuxbro

title: Travamento ao usar dois monitores
content:
Quando utilizo o laptop isoladamente o navegador carrega e posso usá-lo sem dificuldade. Ao inserir uma tela adicional através da porta HDMI, é verificada a instabilidade instantânea culminando no travamento. O mesmo não ocorre com outros navegadores. Resumindo, sem o segundo monitor funciona, com, trava e não é mais possível usar.

Alguém que tenha experimentado algo parecido e possa indicar como resolveu o problema?

O equipamento em questão traz consigo Windows 11 com todos os drivers e navegador atualizados; agora, por exemplo, ao colocar esta questão, o faço através do Mozilla.
